pages.text: $(br)Push the metal fountain you are pointing at. $(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - You can use Shift + Spacebar to push towards the block at your feet. $(br) - In case there are no valid blocks, consume metal nuggets.

pages.title: Interacciones
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Greatly increases thrust. $(br2) + Lerasium: Slightly increases thrust. $(br2) + Both: Maximize thrust.
